name: Engineering and Machinery Alliance
memberOrga: http://www.eama.info/ has a list of member trade association on its Home Page.
goal: To represent the UK machinery and component manufacturing supply chain to government and other stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: Those impacting significantly on the machinery and mechanical engineering sector, industrial productivity, innovation and competitiveness.
